title: RenderSettings
content:

name: RenderSettings
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: ''
description: |
  RenderSettings is a singleton class which lets developers debug components
  of Roblox's graphics engine. It can be found in Roblox Studio's settings under
  the Rendering tab.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - Service
  - NotReplicated
  - NotBrowsable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: RenderSettings.AutoFRMLevel
    summary: |
      Sets the starting quality level of the framerate manager.
    description: |
      Sets the starting quality level of the framerate manager when
      Class.RenderSettings.EnableFRM|EnableFRM is set to true.
    codesamples: []
    type: int
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Debug
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []
  - name: RenderSettings.EagerBulkExecution
    summary: |
      Whether all scene updates will be given an unlimited budget, regardless of
      how computationally expensive it may be.
    description: |
      When set to true, all scene updates will be given an unlimited budget,
      regardless of how computationally expensive it may be. This ensures each
      frame will look as it should, at the cost of a more unstable frame rate.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Performance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []
  - name: RenderSettings.EditQualityLevel
    summary: |
      Sets the graphics quality level in Roblox Studio.
    description: |
      Sets the graphics quality level in Roblox Studio when
      Class.RenderSettings.EnableFRM|EnableFRM is set to false.
    codesamples: []
    type: QualityLevel
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Performance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []

    capabilities: []

    summary: |
      Toggles the enabled state of the framerate manager.

      Sets whether materials should be generated per part, or per unique

      Sets whether materials should be generated per part, or per unique

    codesamples: []

    capabilities: []
  - name: RenderSettings.MeshCacheSize
    summary: |
      The size in bytes of the mesh cache.
    description: |
      The size in bytes of the mesh cache. Defaults to 32 MiB.
    codesamples: []
    type: int
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Cache
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []
  - name: RenderSettings.MeshPartDetailLevel
    summary: |
      Studio only. Used to visually verify the quality of
      Class.MeshPart|MeshParts at lower level of detail at close range.
    description: |
      Determines the mode for the selection of detail levels for mesh parts. For
      a good balance between performance and fidelity, this should be set to
      Enum.MeshPartDetailLevel.DistanceBased (default), which is what the
      client uses.

      Note that the Class.MeshPart.RenderFidelity needs to be set to
      Enum.RenderFidelity.Automatic for this to work. If you set it to
      Enum.RenderFidelity.Precise, you will always see the higher resolution
      version and the Enum.MeshPartDetailLevel value will be ignored for that
      Class.MeshPart.
    codesamples: []
    type: MeshPartDetailLevel
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Debug
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []
  - name: RenderSettings.QualityLevel
    summary: |
      Controls the quality level in Roblox Studio.
    description: |
      If Class.RenderSettings.EnableFRM|EnableFRM is set to true, this
      property controls the quality level in Roblox Studio.
    codesamples: []
    type: QualityLevel
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Performance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []

    summary: |
      Whether Roblox Studio will automatically reload changes that are made to
      files in Roblox's content folder.
    description: |
      When set to true, Roblox Studio will automatically reload changes that
      are made to files in Roblox's content folder.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Debug
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []

    codesamples: []
    type: boolean

    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe

    serialization:
      canload: true

    capabilities: []

    summary: |
      Whether bounding boxes are rendered around each individual rendered entity

    description: |
      If set to true, renders bounding boxes around each individual rendered
